answerText: Timothy Donaghy[10] Collusion among sumo wrestlers was compared to cheating on standardized tests by teachers in the first chapter of this 2005 book, written by Steven Levitt and Stephen J. Dubner.
heading: ACF Fall |2008 | Caltech + Langston | 14 | Trash | None | College
subject: Trash
question: Question: Identify the following about cheating in sports,  [10] This referee recently pled guilty to federal charges related to the fixing of NBA games, for which he was sentenced to 15 months in prison in July 2008.
